page.title: 10THE POST OFFICE,TREVERVA
page.content: There is a post office at Treverva settlement which is situated in a rural area.The areas it serves are Treverva and Lemamva.As the tourist season comes the trade varies.As well as having a post office,which you can buy stamps etc from,they sell groceries,sweets,medicine,coal,toys,gi fts, stationary,wool,batteries,drinks and alchohol.The opening hours are Monday to Saturday 7.30am to 8.00pm and on Sundays 9.00am to 5.00pm.'Bed and Breakfast'and'Take away Foods'are available there are also garden produce for sale.
